oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: David Allan Coe Show at the Yellow Rose Tavern
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Coe, David Allan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the David Allan Coe Show at the Yellow Rose Tavern on January 22. Poster features a metal photoplate of David Allan Coe. Purchase order 21683.
